Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: TammyTam
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, meets expectations.. Lots of storage and long battery and was priced right. Would recommend this phone to Anyone.

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: Eric Soriano
Reviews.Content: didnt work properlyit was already damaged from the back of the phone..........it would accept my at&t; sim card

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Violetta
Reviews.Content: As soon as I charged the phone issues started with phone. I think this was a refurbished phone sold "as new". Would not but from Accessory Distributor again.

Reviews.Title: It is super fast
Reviews.Author: enver lora
Reviews.Content: I do everything with, well sailed shame that in my country at & t does not serve much in the theme of the internet with at & t here not even the 3g upload, but here is used for the t-mobile 4g.but after all I like this model motorola.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Andrew Newsome
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is good. Meets the expectations i had of it.I love the internal memory this phone has.

Reviews.Title: Love the phone!  Awesome phone.
Reviews.Author: datl
Reviews.Content: But it didn't work with Net 10 service.  AT&T; has blocked so many of the features when you buy an unlocked phone and try to use it with any other service carrier.  Plus it was configured for the Asian market, not the US.  This has happened to me with two different phones I purchased from Amazon.  So no one is checking to see if they work in the US before they are selling them.  Shame on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Francisco Jimenez
Reviews.Content: this phone is a lot better than a flip phone that I use to have to carry. Unfortunately it seems to have some type of power/battery issue because it turns off on me @ random moments. It doesn't happen every day but it happens when I least expect it to. Besides that issue, I like the phone.
